You may also be looking for Third Age 1900.

Tolkien-related events that took place in 1900.

content.title: June
content.content: ? - Mabel Tolkien and her sister May Incledon are received into the Church of Rome, bringing about the wrath and opposition of their strongly Baptist relatives.

content.title: August
content.content: 25 - Friedrich Nietzsche, whose works have been compared to those of J.R.R. Tolkien in scholarly articles, dies.

content.title: September
content.content: ? - J.R.R. Tolkien is admitted into King Edward's School after passing the entrance exam.

content.title: Late
content.content:
? - The Tolkiens move from Sarehole to Moseley to be closer to Birmingham and King Edward's School.
Years
1897 1898 1899 1900 1901 1902 1903
